TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KerberosRequestorSecurityToken extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken

summary.span: 表示一个安全令牌，它基于在 SOAP 请求中发送的 Kerberos 票证。

span.span: Represents a security token that is based upon a Kerberos ticket that is sent in an SOAP request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，应用程序开发人员无需使用 类，除非 Web 服务必须获得与 Kerberos 票证关联的服务主体名称。Typically, application developers do not need to use the class, unless a Web service must get the service principal name associated with the Kerberos ticket. 若要获得服务主体名称的值，需要获得 属性的值。To get the value of the service principal name, get the value of the property. 有两个类表示基于 Kerberos 票证的安全令牌： 和 。There are two classes that represent security tokens that are based upon a Kerberos ticket: and . 安全令牌由在传出 SOAP 消息中使用 安全令牌的客户端使用，而 安全令牌由接收包含该安全令牌的 SOAP 消息的 Web 服务使用。The security token is used by clients that use the security token in an outgoing SOAP messages, whereas the security token is used by a Web service that receives SOAP messages that contain the security token.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public KerberosRequestorSecurityToken (string servicePrincipalName);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string servicePrincipalName) cil managed
Public Sub New (servicePrincipalName As String)
public: KerberosRequestorSecurityToken(System::String ^ servicePrincipalName);

param.name: servicePrincipalName
param.span: 安全令牌的服务主体名称。

span.span: The service principal name for the security token.
Sets the property.

summary.span: 使用与指定的服务主体名称关联的服务来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using a service that is associated with the specified service principal name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务主体名称必须采用下列格式之一：`host/@` 或 ``；其中，`hostname` 是承载目标 Web 服务的计算机的名称，而 `domain` 是主计算机所在的 Kerberos 领域的完全限定域名。The service principal name must be in one of the following formats: `host/@` or ``, where `hostname` is the name of the computer hosting the target Web service and `domain` is the fully-qualified domain name of the Kerberos realm in which the host computer resides. 服务主体名称与运行该服务的帐户关联，并且此映射存储在 Kerberos 域控制器 (KDC) 中。The service principal name is associated with an account that is running the service and this mapping is stored in the Kerberos Domain Controller (KDC).

span.span: is .

exception.span: 无法为当前用户获取 Kerberos 票证。

span.span: A Kerberos ticket cannot be obtained for the current user.

MemberSignature.Value: public KerberosRequestorSecurityToken (string servicePrincipalName, System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel tokenImpersonationLevel, System.Net.NetworkCredential networkCredential, string id);

param.span: 值之一，它指定客户端允许在何种级别上模拟 安全令牌。

span.span: One of the values that specifies how the client allows the security token to be impersonated.

param.name: networkCredential
param.span: 一个 ，它指定要为其获取 安全令牌的用户。

span.span: A that specifies the user to get a security token for.

param.span: 安全令牌的唯一标识符。

span.span: A unique identifier of the security token.
Sets the value of the property.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务主体名称必须采用下列格式之一：`host/@` 或 ``；其中，`hostname` 是承载目标 Web 服务的计算机的名称，而 `domain` 是主计算机所在的 Kerberos 领域的完全限定域名。The service principal name must be in one of the following formats: `host/@` or ``, where `hostname` is the name of the computer hosting the target Web service and `domain` is the fully-qualified domain name of the Kerberos realm in which the host computer resides. 服务主体名称与运行该服务的帐户关联，并且此映射存储在 Kerberos 域控制器 (KDC) 中。The service principal name is associated with an account that is running the service and this mapping is stored in the Kerberos Domain Controller (KDC). 当 `null` 被传递到 `networkCredential` 参数中时，将为当前用户获得 安全令牌。When `null` is passed into the `networkCredential` parameter, a security token is obtained for the current user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Kerberos 票证请求是使用 `InitializeSecurityContext` API 发出的。The Kerberos ticket request is made using the `InitializeSecurityContext` API.

summary.span: 获取与此安全令牌关联的 Kerberos 票证的对称会话密钥。

span.span: Gets the symmetric session key for the Kerberos ticket that is associated with this security token.

value.span: 一个 ，它包含与此安全令牌关联的 Kerberos 票证的对称会话密钥。

span.span: A that contains the symmetric session key for the Kerberos ticket that is associated with this security token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当使用为指定用户获得的 Kerberos 票证的对称会话密钥调用构造函数之一时，将设置 属性。The property is set when one of the constructors is called with the symmetric session key for the Kerberos ticket that is obtained for the specified user.

.property instance valuetype System.DateTime ValidFrom
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property ValidFrom As DateTime
public: virtual property DateTime ValidFrom { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: 获取此安全令牌有效的最初时刻。

span.span: Gets the first instant in time at which this security token is valid.

value.span: 一个 ，表示此安全令牌有效的最初时刻。

span.span: A that represents the instant in time at which this security token is first valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性被设置为获得 Kerberos 票证时的时刻，该时刻以协调世界时 (UTC) 表示。The property is set to the instant in time when the Kerberos ticket is obtained in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

summary.span: 获取此安全令牌有效的最后时刻。

span.span: Gets the last instant in time at which this security token is valid.

value.span: 一个 ，表示此安全令牌有效的最后时刻。

span.span: A that represents the last instant in time at which this security token is valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性被设置为 Kerberos 票证到期时的时刻，该时刻以协调世界时 (UTC) 表示。The property is set to the instant in time when the Kerberos ticket expires in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
